TopicTitle: Mod Request for Science Bot and Engineer Bot

Articles.Content:
With the addition of mods that increase the Kerbal Solar System, I would like to see 2 Bots that can perform activities just as Kerbals can. One for Science and one for Engineering. (Pilots not required)

They could be high in the tech tree, and could require mission training on lower level bodies.

( they could be flesh toned)
